TextView.android:text: Application for Rental of Heavy Equipment
The fees imposed herein shall be paid to the Municipal Treasurer or his duly authorized representative, before the use or occupancy of the property.
Residence within the LGU and Barangays
2. (1) original copy of the billing statement
1. Submits letter request and billing statement
1.1. Received the letter request,\n\n1.2. Prepares the billing statement
2. Pays the fees as reflected in the billing statement
2.1. Received issued official receipt\n\n2.2. Photocopy OR/ record to logbook
3. Submits Official Request of heavy equipment to GSO
4.1. Provide the usage of heavy equipment
550/hour -excluding diesel fuel, quarry fee & toll fees
